CustomField.formula: if (!isblank( Responsibility_Hold_Stop__c )&& !isblank( Responsibility_Hold_Start__c ),(Responsibility_Hold_Stop__c - Responsibility_Hold_Start__c )*24, if (isblank(Responsibility_Hold_Stop__c )&& !isblank(Responsibility_Hold_Start__c ), (Now() - Responsibility_Hold_Start__c )*24, 0))
CustomField.label: Responsibility Age
